about_the_game:
Fight and collect monsters as you explore dungeons and solve puzzles. Two strange men along with strange creatures have appeared and are causing trouble throughout the land. Assemble a team of your choice, to defeat the monsters and to save your home.

* Over 100 monsters to catch and collect

* Over 4 thematic dungeons to explore, each with unique puzzles.

* Embark on a story-rich adventure to save your home from creatures from another world.
detailed_description:
Fight and collect monsters as you explore dungeons and solve puzzles. Two strange men along with strange creatures have appeared and are causing trouble throughout the land. Assemble a team of your choice, to defeat the monsters and to save your home.

* Over 100 monsters to catch and collect

* Over 4 thematic dungeons to explore, each with unique puzzles.

* Embark on a story-rich adventure to save your home from creatures from another world.
name: Along Came a Dragonfly

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: INTEL HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A mysterious figure, Monsters from another realm, and a war of beasts and men 1000 years ago... Strange creatures from another dimension have appeared all over the land. Explore dungeons, solve puzzles, and capture monsters in this turn-based RPG, and discover a mystery best left forgotten.
